contentList.content: Chromatic Blade
This blade shimmers with elemental force.
Chromatic Weapon
Imbue a weapon with elemental power. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2] damage of your choice.
Chromatic Weapon: Acid
Imbue a weapon with acid. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Has a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals additional acid damage.
Chromatic Weapon: Cold
Imbue a weapon with cold. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Has a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals additional cold damage.
Chromatic Weapon: Fire
Imbue a weapon with fire. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Has a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals additional fire damage.
Chromatic Weapon: Lightning
Imbue a weapon with lightning. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Has a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals additional lightning damage.
Chromatic Weapon: Thunder
Imbue a weapon with thunder. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Has a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals additional thunder damage.
Charge
Charge forward and attack the first enemy in your way.
